th
Street, New York, NY 11106 • (412) 807-9503 • angelina.choi7@gmail.com
EDUCATION
CARNEGIE MELLON UNIVERSITY | DECEMBER 2014
Bachelor of Science in Decision Science
Minor in Business Administration
RELEVANT COURSE WORK
: Empirical Research Methods | Decision Analysis Decision Support System | Organizational Behavior |
Marketing | Behavioral Economics | Cognitive Psychology
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
YUANTA SECURITIES ASIA FINANCIAL SERVICES LTD. | SEOUL, SOUTH KOREA
Intern | Enterprise Analysis Research Center
•Coordinated daily morning meeting for the Research Center and Corporate Business Team of 50 people primarily by preparing literature
and distributing other relevant material for that day’s meeting agenda
•Built custom PowerPoint templates that streamlined Presentation data and transformed traditional presentations into modern and
aesthetically pleasing alternatives
•Submitted and maintained series of database spreadsheets with daily updated spot commodities prices of oil and chemicals, with currencies
exchanged to USD, CNY and KRW
•Gathered and interpreted statistics of 50+ national box office movie audiences in order to identify emerging trends that would assist in
forecasting future profitability. Presented findings in a monthly summary report with appropriate graphs and charts, illustrating the
periodical data and Year on Year trends
•Conducted a comparative case study distinguishing the unique strengths and weaknesses of three competing travel agencies by collecting and
analyzing pricing data and consumer convenience surveys with a specific focus on Korean market share
KOREA COMMUNICATION AGENCY (KCA) | SEOUL, SOUTH KOREA
Intern | Communications Policy Research & Development Bureau
•Designed a PowerPoint presentation on the economic issues of the pricing system in the broadcast industry from an economist’s standpoint,
and conducted a seminar to a group of 30
•Researched the world’s governmental monitoring policy on advertisement, and shared findings with supervisors to assist their research.
Transcribed research results from English to Korean on a document
KOREA INVESTMENT & SECURITIES CO. | SEOUL, SOUTH KOREA
Intern | Department of Global Investment Strategy
•Analyzed daily financial securities data using MS Excel and presented to supervisor (1 - 2 pages daily)
•Compiled daily briefing of U.S. financial market. Assisted supervisors in finding flickr, equity and other numerical data through Bloomberg.
PROJECTS
ESCORT BUS SYSTEM PROPOSAL | PITTSBURGH, PA
•Diagnosed problems of an existing Campus Escort Bus System by distributing self-designed questionnaires to the student body
•Conducted interviews with the Campus Police Department and Student Life Office staff to collect relevant data
•Proposed suggestions on altering the Escort System to the Police Department by communicating with the head lieutenant
•Delivered proposals addressing the problems, and their adequate solutions along with the risk factors to the Social and Decision Sciences
department
CAKE AND COOKIE SPOT | PITTSBURGH, PA
•Explored shortcomings of Cake and Cookie Spot’s marketing strategy and presented appropriate solutions on finding a strong brand identity
and enhancing its online presence and public awareness
•Interviewed managers and employers about the issues and proposed solutions
•Assembled demographic information of potential customers through surveys
•Participated and presented results with four other classmates in year-end showcase
LEADERSHIP
ALPHA KAPPA DELTA PHI SORORITY, INC. | PITTSBURGH, PA
Sisterhood Chair
•Organized annual formal banquets and quarterly sisterhood events accommodating up to 50 people
•Monitored budget of $2,500, secured location, negotiated menu and price, advertised events online and offline
Choreographer
•Choreographed dance productions for annual cultural and charity events
SKILLS
